title: Simulation-Based Lecture Design to Enhance Professional Civic Competencies Using Vision Statements

context.prior_knowledge: Basic practical experience as a professional, intermediate-level theoretical knowledge in the domain, and understanding of professional ethics and social responsibility
context.additional_context: Linking the work context of professional learners in medical, legal, and technological fields. Strengthens BYOD environment VR simulation practices considering the interaction between citizens' rights and professional systems. Focuses on improving learners' cultural competency and policy analysis skills.

learning_goals: Learners can align the social responsibility and vision statement of the profession with course design objectives.
Learners design and implement vision-based learning activities considering the cultural and institutional context of the profession in a VR simulation environment.
Learners establish strategies to improve course design based on formative assessment feedback and professional ethical standards.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
